domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@Mike_Pence I think you meant to say, "sanctity of human life except when it comes to covid19.  Then screw you all.  You're on your own." 

Oh, and, "... the unborn.  But the 140,000 lives lost to coronavirus, we don't give a crap about them. Or the ones soon to be lost. "
